import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core' import { Cursos } from 'src/app/models/Users' import { UsersService } from 'src/app/services/users.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-pagina-principal', templateUrl: './pagina-principal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pagina-principal.component.css'], }) export class PaginaPrincipalComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public userService: UsersService) {} nombre = '' usuarios = localStorage.getItem('usuarioensesion') dataComents: Coments[] = [] ngOnInit(): void {} obtenercoment() { this.datoscurso = [] this.userService.traercursos().subscribe( async (res: any) => { let valores: any = res this.datoscurso = valores }, (err) => console.log(err), ) } }

    {{ usuarios }}
